thread.title: BRIEF-Providence Service Files Prospectus Relates To Offer, Sale From Time To Time Of Up To 1.65 Mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Providence Service Files Prospectus Relates To Offer, Sale From Time To Time Of Up To 1.65 Mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Providence Service Corp:
* PROVIDENCE SERVICE CORP FILES PROSPECTUS RELATES TO OFFER, SALE FROM TIME TO TIME OF UP TO 1.65 MILLION SHARES OF COâ€™S COMMON STOCK - SEC FILING
* PROVIDENCE SERVICE CORP - PROSPECTUS ALSO RELATES TO OFFER, SALE FROM TIME TO TIME OF UP TO 765,916 SHARES OF SERIES A CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK
* PROVIDENCE SERVICE- PROSPECTUS ALSO RELATES TO OFFER, SALE OF 1.92 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK INITIALLY ISSUABLE UPON CONVERSION OF SERIES A CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK Source text: ( bit.ly/2K8xBDg ) Further company coverage:
